text: Carlos Barrera Sánchez (3 December 1950 – 7 April 2022) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the Aranese Democratic Convergence. He was Sindic d'Aran from 1995 to 2007 and again from 2011 to 2019. He was born in Vielha, Spain. Barrera Sánchez died on 7 April 2022 in Vielha from cancer at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Spanish politicians
title: Carlos Barrera Sánchez
